CustomField.formula: IF((TEXT(GES_Meeting_Planner__c ) == "Chambers, Brenda"),"(412) 408-0506", IF((TEXT(GES_Meeting_Planner__c ) == "Wagner, Allyson"),"(412) 523-2991", IF((TEXT(GES_Meeting_Planner__c ) == "Travis, Brian"),"", IF((TEXT(GES_Meeting_Planner__c ) == "Caci, Marie"),"", IF((TEXT(GES_Meeting_Planner__c ) == "Kramer, Maria"),"(412) 389-2222", IF((TEXT(GES_Meeting_Planner__c ) == "Rogers, Kayla"),"(508) 408-2146"," "))))))
CustomField.label: GES Meeting Planner Phone Formula
